Text:
This is a Herzog related comment: I just uploaded "Requiem for a Dying Planet", the soundtrack to The Wild Blue Yonder & The White Diamond.

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3968127/Requiem_For_A_Dying_Planet_-_Werner_Herzog__Ernst_Reijseger_And_

This is a such great movie. Many people don't know it, because it's not from hollywood. But this was directed buy Werner Herzog, and starred by Klaus Kinski. The original audio is german and it was filmed in PerĂş, back when the jungle was still virgin and landscapes were not spoiled by mining and gas prospection. An excellent movie.
Any seeder, please?

Graeat! i hope for seeds!
Gracias!
